property.name: how_to_add_connector
property.description: To integrate a new Trino connector within the Ambari configuration, you must add a specific property. This property should begin with `connector_` followed by the name of the connector you wish to add. For instance, to add a Hive connector, the property name should be `connector_hive`. Assign the appropriate configuration details as the value of this property. After adding this property, a system restart is required for the changes to be effective. If you need to remove a Trino connector, simply delete the relevant configuration property that was previously added. Don't forget to restart the system thereafter to ensure that the removal is properly processed.
